Title: The Dark Defender
Plot: Dexter finds out that the man who killed his mother, right in front of him, is still alive. When he tells this to Lila, she suggests he face the man, as part of his road to addiction recovery. But then as his sponsor she insists on tagging along.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Sage Kirkpatrick, Tony Amendola, Jaime Murray, Keith Carradine, JoBeth Williams
